title: Autocatalytic DNA circuitries
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00046C, Tutorial Review
Qiong Wu, Wei Xu, Jinhua Shang, Jiajing Li, Xiaoqing Liu, Fuan Wang, Jinghong Li
A critical review of recent developments in autocatalytic DNA circuits, rooted in DNAzyme biocatalysis, enzyme catalysis, and dynamic hybridization assembly, and their practical applications across bioanalysis, biomedicine, and biomimetics.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
